title: Google\Cloud\ContactCenterInsights\V1\FaqAnswerData
name: FaqAnswerData
description:
Agent Assist frequently-asked-question answer data.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.contactcenterinsights.v1.FaqAnswerData

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.answer
params.description: The piece of text from the source knowledge base document.

params.name: data.confidence_score
params.description: The system's confidence score that this answer is a good match for this conversation, ranging from 0.0 (completely uncertain) to 1.0 (completely certain).

params.name: data.metadata
params.description: Map that contains metadata about the FAQ answer and the document that it originates from.

params.name: data.query_record
params.description: The name of the answer record. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/answerRecords/{answer_record}

params.name: data.source
params.description: The knowledge document that this answer was extracted from. Format: projects/{project}/knowledgeBases/{knowledge_base}/documents/{document}.
